about_the_game:
ForkJump is a single-player, third-person exploration game that combines 3D platforming with a captivating, horror-themed adventure set in an open-world sci-fi environment. Players must be cautious of disturbed jumping fork monsters and other hazards such as hidden fork-jump-scare traps. Amidst this atmospheric, dark and fork-obsessed playground governed by physics mechanisms, players navigate through lands filled with mysterious robots, unexpected characters, formidable enemies, challenges, complex structures, and many forks. Players are encouraged to harness swift parkour movements and utilize the innovative "ForkJump Gun" to teleport and navigate the world, where mastering momentum physics is crucial. In ForkJump, players can expect to spend considerable time at high altitudes, jumping, teleporting, and soaring through the air, leveraging the game's unique physics mechanisms.

Gameplay Highlights:

ForkJump Gun in Action: Utilize the ForkJump Gun to retrieve Fork “keys”, unveiling areas and pathways previously deemed unreachable.

Cybernetic Adversaries & Allies: Encounter unique robots and aliens, each adding a piece to the story puzzle.

Select Character Appearance: Make your mark in this cyberworld. Tailor your character's appearance, standing out amid the otherworldly landscapes.

Parkour Platformer Mastery: Jump, evade, sprint. Turn the world into a parkour playground with dynamic movements.

The game features hidden Forks to collect across several different islands, each offering unique challenges. This aspect enhances the game's replayability, as players may come across Forks in new, unexpected locations in each playthrough. The ultimate goal is to find the legendary treasure and become the "giga cyborg," akin to a godlike king. The ultimate cyborg upgrade.

Sci-Fi Aesthetic Dive: Immerse in a universe where futuristic architecture and gripping narratives merge, ensuring every turn beckons discovery.

Embark on a journey rich in intrigue. Why such an obsession with Forks? Dive deep, unravel the mystery, and embark on a "ForkJump" adventure like no other.

Precision & Strategy: In this momentum-physics-centric world, chart your path with care. Balance rapid parkour with pinpoint teleportation as you maneuver through elevated terrains.

Fork Obsession: Dive into the enigma behind collecting Forks. With each acquisition, fresh realms unlock, revealing secrets and edging you closer to the legendary treasure, the giga cyborg upgrade.

content_descriptors.notes:
1) Jump Scares: These can be a intense for some people and frightening.
2) Disturbing Sounds: Contains dark and scary sounds.
3) Scary Chasing: Being pursued or chased in the game. Doesn't feel realistic.
4) Use of Fork Weapons: Can potentially be stabbed by a Fork in the game. Mild violence, non realistic violence.

name: ForkJump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit CPU and OS
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum a 1280x720 pixels monitor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: A dark, third-person, open-world exploration game set in a sci-fi environment. Dodge dangers, jumping fork monsters and fork-jump-scares. Master parkour and teleportation to discover secret areas and Forks, delving into the mystery of the Fork obsession and aiming to become the ultimate giga cyborg.
